air_shield.name: Air Shield
description: All friendly entities within the range of the spell
add 1 per Rank to their Protection value.

control_elemental.name: Control Elemental
description: Charms one Elemental, causing it to fight
for the party for the remainder of the battle
or until it is killed.

debilitation.name: Debilitation
description: Target loses 2 Strength for each Rank of the spell.
May only be cast once on each target.

dragon_flames.name: Dragon Flames
description: The target(s) of this spell are attacked by
wicked dragon flames emanating from the caster.

earth_smite.name: Earth Smite
description: The target of this spell is struck by a large chunk of earth.
Only affects targets of human size or smaller.

fireball.name: Fireball
description: Fireballs are fired from the fingertips of the caster,
striking each target in the area of effect - friend and foe alike.

immolation.name: Immolation
description: Fires a burst of flame at the target,
who catches fire and takes 1-6 points of damage
per round thereafter until the spell expires.

lightning.name: Lightning
description: Targets of the spell are attacked by lightning.

remove_poison.name: Remove Poison
description: Neutralizes the effects of poison if successful.

strength.name: Strength
description: Target gains 2 Strength for each Rank of the spell.
May only be cast once on each target.

wind.name: Wind
description: The caster creates a vicious blast
of wind which will attack one target,
and dispels any fog that may be present
on the battlefield.
